long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1v1.LOL Unblocked for Chrome Extension is an exciting online game that can be played for free on the website https://1v1lol.org/. It offers fast-paced 1v1 battles in a third-person shooter format. The game allows players to customize their characters with different skins, emotes, and sprays. With a variety of weapons and building structures, players can engage in intense battles and test their skills and reflexes. Whether you choose the Practice mode to hone your abilities, the Quick Match mode to face random opponents, or the Custom Match mode to play with friends, "1v1.LOL Unblocked" provides an action-packed gaming experience. Visit the website and start challenging players from around the world in thrilling 1v1 battles.

How to play:
LMB - Shoot
RMB - Zoom/aim
W/A/S/D - Move
1, 2, 3 - Switch to weapons
R - Reload/rotate
F - Switch to axe
Z - Build wall
X - Build platform
C - Build ramp
V - Build roof
E - Interact
